metadata.name: mod_flexicontent - Carousel Layout
metadata.author: ggppdk
metadata.description: Flexicontent Universal Content Module, CAROUSEL Layout

field.default:
NOTE:
-- ONLY standard items are placed inside the carousel.
-- the featured items are display statically above the carousel. Set featured items to zero to only show items inside carousel

field.name: carousel_mode
field.label: Direction
field.description: Description of scrolling

field.name: carousel_padding_top_bottom
field.label: padding top/bottom
field.description: This is the padding applied at top and bottom of the items

field.name: carousel_padding_left_right
field.label: padding left/right
field.description: This is the padding applied at left and right of the items

field.name: carousel_border_width
field.label: border width
field.description: This is the border width applied around the items

field.name: carousel_hdir_item_width
field.label: item width (px)
field.description: Width of items when scrolling horizontally

field.name: carousel_hdir_margin_right
field.label: item margin right (px)
field.description: This is the margin applied at right of items in a horizontal carousel

field.name: carousel_vdir_items
field.label: # items
field.description: Number of items that will be displayed when scrolling vertically

field.name: carousel_vdir_margin_bottom
field.label: item margin bottom (px)
field.description: This is the margin applied at bottom of items in a vertical carousel

field.name: carousel_edgewrap
field.label: Edge wrap around
field.description: When an edge is reached wrap around to the other edge

field.name: carousel_autoplay
field.label: Enable
field.description: Start playing after page loads

field.name: carousel_interval
field.label: Play Interval (ms)
field.description: Milliseconds between autoplay steps

field.name: carousel_method
field.label: Play Method
field.description: The carousel can move to next / previous item, or to next / previous page

field.name: carousel_show_page_handles
field.label: Enable
field.description: Display One page button per page of items

field.name: carousel_page_handle_event
field.label: Activation Event
field.description: How the page buttons will get activated

field.name: carousel_show_handles
field.label: Enable
field.description: Display One Thumbnail will be created per content item, and content will be accessible via click or mouseover

field.name: carousel_handle_duration
field.label: Auto-scroll duration (ms)
field.description: Milliseconds when auto-scrolling the handles box e.g. at edges or when a new page is selected

field.name: carousel_handle_width
field.label: Width
field.description: This is the width of thumbnail image of each item

field.name: carousel_handle_height
field.label: Height
field.description: This is the height of thumbnail image of each item

field.name: carousel_handle_event
field.label: Activation Event
field.description: How the content item buttons get activated

field.name: carousel_handle_title
field.label: Title
field.description: Display a title for the thumbnail, e.g. as tooltip or caption

field.name: carousel_handle_text
field.label: Description
field.description: Display a title for the thumbnail, e.g. as tooltip or caption

field.name: carousel_show_controls
field.label: Enable
field.description: Display previous, next, previous page, next page, play, playback, stop, etc controls. The integrated controls will be placed inside or at the edges of the ITEM display area usually as big arrows but maybe customized to display differently. Integrated controls can be configured to transition single item or a full page

field.name: carousel_icontrols_method
field.label: Play Method
field.description: The carousel can move to next / previous item, or to next / previous page

field.name: carousel_dcontrols_labels
field.label: Show labels
field.description: Display Autoplay, Pages, Items label in front of the controls

field.name: carousel_dcontrols_auto
field.label: Autoplay controls
field.description: Display Autoplay controls

field.name: carousel_dcontrols_pages
field.label: Page controls
field.description: Display Page controls

field.name: carousel_dcontrols_items
field.label: Item controls
field.description: Display Item controls

field.name: carousel_transition
field.label: Enable
field.description: Select the effect to be used when carousel updates

field.name: carousel_duration
field.label: Duration (ms)
field.description: Milliseconds that a carousel change will last

field.name: carousel_easing
field.label: Method
field.description: Select the method for easing the above selected effect

field.name: carousel_easing_inout
field.label: Slow start/ending
field.description: Select to use a slow transition start (easeIn) or slow transition ending (easeOut) or both of them (easeInOut)

field.default: Already visible items handling (for fade/slide effects)

field.name: carousel_transition_visible_duration
field.label: Moving Duration (ms)
field.description: Already visible item will be moved instead of fading, select the moving duration in milliseconds. NOTE: this is for non-scroll transitions
